name: Myra S. Wilson
content: Staff profiles  :		Department of Computer Science ,		Aberystwyth UniversityDr Myra Wilson BSc (Aberdeen), PhD (Edinburgh) Senior Lecturer Department of Computer Science Contact Details Email: mxw@aber.ac.uk Office: C53, Llandinam Building Phone: +44 (0) 1970 622928 Personal Website: http://users.aber.ac.uk/mxw Research Portal Profile Teaching Module Coordinator CS26020 - Robotics and Embedded Systems Lecturer CS39440 - Major Project CS26520 - Artificial Intelligence CS10220 - Introduction to Computer Infrastructure Coordinator CS26020 - Robotics and Embedded Systems Research Groups Intelligent Robotics Group Publications Cañamero, L, Gaussier, P, Wilson, M, Boucenna, S & Cuperlier, N (eds) 2022, From Animals to Animats 16: 16th International Conference on Simulation of Adaptive Behavior, SAB 2022, Cergy-Pontoise, France, September 20–23, 2022, Proceedings.
